title: French President Macron’s snap election gamble 'did not pay off,' professor says
content: The gamble that French President Macron took when he called a snap election in the country has not paid off, Armin Steinbach, professor at HEC Paris said.
summary: The gamble that French President Macron took when he called a snap election in the country has not paid off, Armin Steinbach, professor at HEC Paris said.

title: France avoided a far-right election win — now the radical far left is demanding power
content: After the left-wing's election success in France, all eyes are now on radical firebrand Jean-Luc Melenchon who has demanded the left be given the premiership.
summary: After the left-wing's election success in France, all eyes are now on radical firebrand Jean-Luc Melenchon who has demanded the left be given the premiership.

title: Ukrainian children's hospital hit, 31 people killed in daytime Russian missile attack
content: Russian forces launched more than 40 missiles across Ukraine, seriously damaging a children's hospital in Kyiv, Ukrainian officials said.

title: India's Modi to meet Putin in Moscow as both sides seek to forge deeper ties

title: Danish brewer Carlsberg to buy soft drinks maker Britvic in $4 billion deal after improved offer
